name: HMCharacteristicValueInputEvent
desc: Possible values for the input event of a programmable switch.

items.name: case singlePress
items.desc: The programmable switch detected a single press event.

items.name: case doublePress
items.desc: The programmable switch detected a double press event.

items.name: case longPress
items.desc: The programmable switch detected a long press event.
